mapper.insert: insert into patent_application(id, apply_for, dianzisqfs, fawenxlh, zhuanlimc, accept, zhuanlisqh, tongzhismc, shoujianrid, dianzifwrq, tongzhislx, guojisqh, anjianbh, rid, dianzisqlx) values (null, #{apply_for}, #{dianzisqfs}, #{fawenxlh}, #{zhuanlimc}, #{accept}, #{zhuanlisqh}, #{tongzhismc}, #{shoujianrid}, #{dianzifwrq}, #{tongzhislx}, #{guojisqh}, #{anjianbh}, #{rid}, #{dianzisqlx})
